::Aerotaur::
    He woke up from his healing sleep in the CR chamber.  It took him a 
moment to realize where he was and for a brief instant he was in a 
claustrophobic state of panic.  Then he remembered the fight.  He opened the 
CR chamber and stepped out a little unsteady.  He looked around to see who 
else was in the room.
